en: [paste your writing] Proofread my writing above. Fix grammar and spelling mistakes. And make suggestions that will improve the clarity of my writing.
I want to learn about [insert topic]. Identify and share the most important 20% of learnings from this topic that will help me understand 80% of it.

I am working at a Consulting Company for Business and IT Transformation. We are offering a CV to a client with the following specifics: [Enter client specifics]. The CV is as follows [Enter CV here via copy paste]. Imagine you are the potential client. What are you missing on the CV for a successful implementation of the upcoming project?

I am working at a Consulting Company for Business and IT Transformation. There is a potential client asking for a proposal with following background [enter client and proposal background]. Imagine you are this client. What would you expect of a consulting company in the phase of the proposal so you would select this consultancy?

I am working at a Consulting Company for Business and IT Transformation and I want to create a Linkedin posts with the maximum attention in my target group. The target group is [describe your target group here if specification needed]. I already drafted the following content for the post: [Enter your draft content here]. Can you please optimize the text with the goal of attention and end the post with a question to start conversation in the comments. Please use the 80/20 approach to keep the text short.
